meta.name: East African Community (EAC) - Accession of Burundi and Rwanda

chapter.article:
1. The Republic of Rwanda hereby becomes a member of the East African Community and a party to the Treaty, all Protocols to the Treaty, Tripartite Agreements and Memoranda of Understanding by which the Treaty is supplemented,
2. The conditions of admission, levels of co-operation, accession to the acquis communautaire of the East African Community entailed by such admission are set out in the Annex to this Treaty. The provisions of this Annex shall form an integral part ofthis Treaty.
3. The provisions concerning the rights and obligations of the Republic of Rwanda and the powers and jurisdiction of the Institutions of the East African Community as set out in the Treaty shall apply in respect of this Treaty.
4. The Republic of Rwanda shall within twelve months from the date of signing this Treaty secure the enactment and the effective implementation of such legislation as is necessary to give effect to this Treaty and in particular:
(a) to confer upon the Community the legal capacity and personality required for the performance ofits functions; and
(b) to confer upon the legislation, regulations and directives of the Community and its institutions the force of law within her territory.

article.name: Co-Operation In Legal And Political Affairs

chapter.article:
The Republic of Rwanda shall take over and implement the acquis communautaire under this area of co-operation as from the date of accession and in particular be bound by the provisions ofthe Treaty on the:
(a) objectives of the Community as provided for under Article 5 of the Treaty;
(b) fundamental principles ofthe Community as provided for under Article 6 ofthe Treaty; and
(c) operational principles of the Community as provided for under Article 7 ofthe Treaty.

article.name: Co-Operation In Trade, Finance, Investment, Monetary And Fiscal Affairs

chapter.article: The Republic of Rwanda shall take over and implement the acquis communautaire under the areas of co-operation as from the date of accession, subject to the specific arrangements as stipulated in the Annex hereto including according the same preferential trade treatment to The United Republic of Tanzania as that accorded to the Republic of Uganda on a reciprocal basis ..

article.name: Participation In The Institutions, Projects And Programmes

chapter.article: The Republic of Rwanda shall upon accession be subject to the financial and budgetary obligations and requirements of the Treaty on the Partner States.

This Treaty shall be ratified by the Republic of Rwanda in accordance with her constitutional requirements. The Republic of Rwanda shall deposit her instruments of ratification with the Secretary General ofthe East African Community.
This Treaty shall enter into force on 1st July, 2007 provided that all the instruments ofratification have been deposited before that date.
This Treaty shall be registered with the African Union, the United Nations and such other organizations as the East African Community Council of Ministers may determine.

IN FAITH WHEREOF the undersigned have appended their signatures hereto:
For The East African Community For The Republic of Rwanda
